tool_description:
The latest news in the UFC and MMA world updated every hour in an easy to access JSON format. 

Response body includes an array of objects with the fields:

Title,
Description,
ImageUrl,
Thumbnail,
SourceUrl,
Author
name: MMA/UFC News
title: MMA/UFC News

api_list.name: latest
api_list.description: Fetches the latest news in the MMA & UFC world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-ufc-news.p.rapidapi.com/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-ufc-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mma-ufc-news.p.rapidapi.com/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mma-ufc-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
